text: Henry Kenneth Alfred Russell (3 July 1927 â€“ 27 November 2011)Independent obituary was a British director, screenwriter, producer and actor. He was born in Southampton, Hampshire.Telegraph obituary He directed Women in Love and The Devils. He was a Roman Catholic.
